title: "Save to device" for backed up video is not working - Pixel 2 XL
content:
It started acting weird this week...
As I attended a wedding and took lots pics, I had to Free Up Space as the storage was getting crowded...
So, although I had some pics & videos I planned to post on my FB, I went ahead to FUS...
Then, later I attempted to "Save to device" for those pics & videos individually (I wish Google Photos improve the method to RESTORE backed up photos & videos in BULK - without creating an album...), I got restored the pics, but for the videos, I couldn't download with "Save to device"... All the results were "Download Unsuccessful". 
So, I researched and tried a few different methods:
- Created an album with all 4 videos (from 11s to 2m43s) then download from within the album â†’ FAILED 
- Get the link of the album (Select Share to create the link), copy&paste on Chrome browser on my cell (I only have a cell with me), select "Download All" â†’FAILED 
- Tried to Share videos individually to my Google Drive â†’ FAILED 
- From My Google Drive, I tried to Upload â†’ "Preparing 1 files for upload" appears and keeps going & going and NOTHING happens... (FAILED)
- From the above album opened in Chrome browser, open the video, then download individually â†’ Worked only for 11s (shorest) & 2m43s (longest) videos, but the other 2 videos have been failing every time... ðŸ˜«

I haved exhausted all the possible methods... and I still have 2 more videos I need to download... ðŸ˜“

This is Crazy!!!

Does anybody have any other suggestions?
